      • setBootstrap

        public RiakNode setBootstrap(io.netty.bootstrap.Bootstrap bootstrap)
        Sets the Netty Bootstrap for this Node's connections. Bootstrap.clone() is called to clone the bootstrap.
        Parameters:
        bootstrap - - the Netty Bootstrap to use
        Returns:
        a reference to this RiakNode
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if it was already set via the builder.
        IllegalStateException - if the node has already been started.
        See Also:
        RiakNode.Builder.withBootstrap(io.netty.bootstrap.Bootstrap)

      • setExecutor

        public RiakNode setExecutor(ScheduledExecutorService executor)
        Sets the ScheduledExecutorService for this Node and its pool(s).
        Parameters:
        executor - - the ScheduledExecutorService to use.
        Returns:
        a reference to this RiakNode
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if it was already set via the builder.
        IllegalStateException - if the node has already been started.
        See Also:
        RiakNode.Builder.withExecutor(java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService)

      • availablePermits

        public int availablePermits()
        Returns the number of permits currently available. The number of available permits indicates how many additional connections can be made without blocking.
        Returns:
        the number of available permits.
        See Also:
        RiakNode.Builder.withMaxConnections(int)

      • addStateListener

        public void addStateListener(NodeStateListener listener)

      • removeStateListener

        public boolean removeStateListener(NodeStateListener listener)

      • execute

        public boolean execute(FutureOperation operation)
        Submits the operation to be executed on this node.
        Parameters:
        operation - The operation to perform
        Returns:
        true if this operation was accepted, false if there were no available connections.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if this node is not in the RUNNING or HEALTH_CHECKING state
        IllegalArgumentException - if the protocol required for the operation is not supported by this node
